750:3070: poṣadhavastu atra granthaḥ-“yaduktaṃ bhagavatā bhikṣuṇī bhiḥ bhikṣūṇāmantike bhikṣuṇībhāvaḥ paryeṣitavyaḥ iti katamesāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ āvāsika-naivāsikānāṃ, upālin“, iti|
750:3071: tatsthānagatā vāsasthaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ upaniśritya bhikṣuṇīnāṃ vāsaḥ|
750:3073: na ca niśrayātikramo yuktaḥ ityetad vijñānam|
750:3077: gṛhyamāṇe saṃvare tasya saṃvarasya yadbhavatvaṃ tasya tadavasthasya utsṛṣṭau pratyākhyānādinā utsarge dhvaṃso bhavati|
750:3079: na ca āneghasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ laṅghanādau dṛśyate|
750:3080: tasmāt, na bhavatyasyā'jāyamānatve saṃvarasya pratyudāvṛttiḥ iti yo manyeta tannābhinivṛttyartha etatsūtram|
